body_html: You're right @carpodaster: 10-12 is invalid JSON (and invalid Ruby) and not parsable by the default JSON parser from stdlib. It should be "10-12" as a string @alicetragedy. Do you have an idea how this value ended up there? I don't even know how it could have been serialized to non-string 🙈

body: You're right @carpodaster: `10-12` is invalid JSON (and invalid Ruby) and not parsable by the default JSON parser from stdlib. It should be `"10-12"` as a string @alicetragedy. Do you have an idea how this value ended up there?  I don't even know how it could have been serialized to *non-string* 🙈
